nodes.text: Gep's Grill was a location at Mos Eisley on Tatooine. It was a stall at the market place where grilled Dewback and Bantha meat was offered at fair prices. It was owned by two Whiphids: Fillin Ta and Norun Gep. The menu was simple, but adequate for the people who visited the place.
Gep's Grill was the main business partner of Spaceport Express.
In When the Desert Wind Turns: The Stormtrooper's Tale, Gep's Grill is misspelled "Gap's Grill".
